description: Create w3schools Sample Database and Use for Testing
body:
/* =============================================================================================================================================================
-- Server		: LOCALSERVER
-- Database		: master
-- Script		: w3schoolsSampleDatabase
-- Description	: Create w3schools Sample Database and Use for Testing
--$BeginRegion: Enable cmdshell
	EXEC sys.sp_configure @configname = 'show advanced options', @configvalue = '1'; RECONFIGURE;
	EXEC sys.sp_configure @configname = 'xp_cmdshell', @configvalue = '1'; RECONFIGURE;
	EXEC sys.sp_configure @configname = 'show advanced options', @configvalue = '0'; RECONFIGURE;
--$EndRegion: Enable cmdshell
============================================================================================================================================================= */
SET NOCOUNT ON;
--
/* ===== ** Creating Data and Log Folders ** ================================================================================================================ */
--$BeginRegion: Create Data and Log Folders
DECLARE @DataFolder NVARCHAR(4000) = N'mkdir "C:\SQL\MSSQL\' + CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') AS VARCHAR(4)) + N'\DATA\"';
EXEC sys.xp_cmdshell @command = @DataFolder;
DECLARE @LogFolder NVARCHAR(4000) = N'mkdir "C:\SQL\MSSQL\' + CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') AS VARCHAR(4)) + N'\LOG\"';
EXEC sys.xp_cmdshell @command = @LogFolder;
--$EndRegion: Create Data and Log Folders
--
/* ===== ** Creating w3schools Database ** ================================================================================================================== */
--$BeginRegion: Create Database w3schools
USE master;
IF EXISTS (SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'w3schools')
BEGIN
	--#BeginRegion: Killing Sessions
	DECLARE @KillSPIDs NVARCHAR(MAX) = N'';
	SELECT @KillSPIDs = @KillSPIDs + CHAR(10) + N'Kill ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), spid) + N';'
	FROM master.sys.sysprocesses -- Deprecated View
	WHERE spid > 50 AND spid <> @@SPId AND dbid = DB_ID('w3schools');
	--PRINT @KillSPIDs;
	EXEC sys.sp_executesql @statement = @KillSPIDs;
	--#EndRegion: Killing Sessions
	ALTER DATABASE w3schools SET SINGLE_USER WITH ROLLBACK IMMEDIATE;
	DROP DATABASE w3schools;
END;
--
DECLARE @SQLcmd NVARCHAR(4000);
SET @SQLcmd = N'
CREATE DATABASE w3schools
ON 
PRIMARY --PRIMARY FileGroup is Default Group
	(NAME=w3schools_data, FILENAME=''C:\SQL\MSSQL\'+CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') AS VARCHAR(4))+'\DATA\w3schools_data.mdf'', SIZE=8192KB, FILEGROWTH=2048KB),
FILEGROUP SECONDARY --SECONDARY FileGroup will be Created Automatically
	(NAME=w3schools_data2, FILENAME=''C:\SQL\MSSQL\'+CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') AS VARCHAR(4))+'\DATA\w3schools_data2.ndf'', SIZE=8192KB, FILEGROWTH=2048KB)
LOG ON
	(NAME=w3schools_log, FILENAME=''C:\SQL\MSSQL\'+CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') AS VARCHAR(4))+'\LOG\w3schools_log.ldf'', SIZE=8192KB, FILEGROWTH=2048KB);'
EXEC sys.sp_executesql @command = @SQLcmd;
--$EndRegion: Create Database w3schools
GO
--
/* ===== ** Creating Tables and Implementing Constraints ** ================================================================================================= */
USE w3schools;
DECLARE @ImplementPK BIT; SET @ImplementPK = 0; --Enable (1) to Create PrimaryKey Constraints
DECLARE @ImplementFK BIT; SET @ImplementFK = 0; --Enable (1) to Create ForeignKey Constraints
--
IF @ImplementPK = 0 AND @ImplementFK = 1 SET @ImplementFK = 0; --Resolving Msg 1776: There are No Primary or Candidate Keys in the Referenced Table
--$BeginRegion: Create Tables and PK-FK Relations
----$BeginRegion: Create Tables with PK
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Orders
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Orders', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders
		(
			OrderID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			CustomerID INT NULL,
			EmployeeID INT NULL,
			OrderDate DATE NULL,
			ShipperID INT NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "OrderID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_OrderID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (OrderID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Orders
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Orders', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Orders
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Customers
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Customers', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Customers
		(
			CustomerID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			CustomerName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			ContactName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Address VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			City VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			PostalCode VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Country VARCHAR(50) NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "CustomerID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Customers
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CustomerID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (CustomerID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Customers
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Customers', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Customers
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Employees
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Employees', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Employees
		(
			EmployeeID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			LastName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			FirstName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			BirthDate DATE NULL,
			Photo VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Notes VARCHAR(4000) NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "EmployeeID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Employees
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_EmployeeID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (EmployeeID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Employees
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Employees', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Employees
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Shippers
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Shippers', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Shippers
		(
			ShipperID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			ShipperName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Phone VARCHAR(15) NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "ShipperID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Shippers
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ShipperID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (ShipperID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Shippers
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Shippers', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Shippers
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
		(
			OrderDetailID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			OrderID INT NULL,
			ProductID INT NULL,
			Quantity INT NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "OrderDetailID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_OrderDetailID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (OrderDetailID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('OrderDetails', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Products
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Products', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Products
		(
			ProductID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			ProductName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			SupplierID INT NULL,
			CategoryID INT NULL,
			Unit VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Price MONEY NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "ProductID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Products
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_ProductID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (ProductID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Products
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Products', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Products
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Categories
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Categories', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Categories
		(
			CategoryID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			CategoryName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Description VARCHAR(MAX) NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "CategoryID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Categories
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CategoryID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (CategoryID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Categories
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Categories', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Categories
--
------$BeginRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Suppliers
IF OBJECT_ID('w3schools.dbo.Suppliers', 'U') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		CREATE TABLE w3schools.dbo.Suppliers
		(
			SupplierID INT IDENTITY(1, 1) NOT NULL,
			SupplierName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			ContactName VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Address VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			City VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			PostalCode VARCHAR(50) NULL,
			Country VARCHAR(50) NULL
		) ON [PRIMARY];
		-- Adding Primary Key Constraint on "SupplierID"
		IF @ImplementPK = 1
			ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Suppliers
			ADD CONSTRAINT PK_SupplierID PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (SupplierID);
	END;
ELSE
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM w3schools.dbo.Suppliers
		WHERE 1 = 1;
		DBCC CHECKIDENT('Suppliers', RESEED, 0);
	END;
------$EndRegion: Table w3schools.dbo.Suppliers
----$EndRegion: Create Tables with PK
--
----$BeginRegion: Create PK-FK Relations
------$BeginRegion: Relation w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
IF OBJECT_ID('[OrderDetails.OrderID=Orders.OrderID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails WITH CHECK
	ADD CONSTRAINT [OrderDetails.OrderID=Orders.OrderID]
		FOREIGN KEY (OrderID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Orders (OrderID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails CHECK CONSTRAINT [OrderDetails.OrderID=Orders.OrderID];
END;

IF OBJECT_ID('[OrderDetails.ProductID=Products.ProductID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails WITH CHECK
	ADD CONSTRAINT [OrderDetails.ProductID=Products.ProductID]
		FOREIGN KEY (ProductID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Products (ProductID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails CHECK CONSTRAINT [OrderDetails.ProductID=Products.ProductID];
END;
------$EndRegion: Relation w3schools.dbo.OrderDetails
--
------$BeginRegion: Relation w3schools.dbo.Orders
IF OBJECT_ID('[Orders.CustomerID=Customers.CustomerID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders WITH CHECK

		FOREIGN KEY (CustomerID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Customers (CustomerID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders CHECK CONSTRAINT [Orders.CustomerID=Customers.CustomerID];
END;

IF OBJECT_ID('[Orders.EmployeeID=Employees.EmployeeID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders WITH CHECK
	ADD CONSTRAINT [Orders.EmployeeID=Employees.EmployeeID]
		FOREIGN KEY (EmployeeID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Employees (EmployeeID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders CHECK CONSTRAINT [Orders.EmployeeID=Employees.EmployeeID];
END;

IF OBJECT_ID('[Orders.ShipperID=Shippers.ShipperID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders WITH CHECK
	ADD CONSTRAINT [Orders.ShipperID=Shippers.ShipperID]
		FOREIGN KEY (ShipperID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Shippers (ShipperID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Orders CHECK CONSTRAINT [Orders.ShipperID=Shippers.ShipperID];
END;
------$EndRegion: Relation w3schools.dbo.Orders
--
------$BeginRegion: Relation w3schools.dbo.Products
IF OBJECT_ID('[Products.CategoryID=Categories.CategoryID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Products WITH CHECK
	ADD CONSTRAINT [Products.CategoryID=Categories.CategoryID]
		FOREIGN KEY (CategoryID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Categories (CategoryID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Products CHECK CONSTRAINT [Products.CategoryID=Categories.CategoryID];
END;
--
IF OBJECT_ID('[Products.SupplierID=Suppliers.SupplierID]', 'F') IS NULL AND @ImplementFK = 1
BEGIN
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Products WITH CHECK
	ADD CONSTRAINT [Products.SupplierID=Suppliers.SupplierID]
		FOREIGN KEY (SupplierID)
		REFERENCES w3schools.dbo.Suppliers (SupplierID) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE;
	--
	ALTER TABLE w3schools.dbo.Products CHECK CONSTRAINT [Products.SupplierID=Suppliers.SupplierID];
END;
------$EndRegion: Relation w3schools.dbo.Products
----$EndRegion: Create PK-FK Relations
--$EndRegion: Create Tables and PK-FK Relations
GO
--

VALUES 
	(1, 'Davolio', 'Nancy', '1968-12-08', 'EmpID1.pic', 'Education includes a BA in psychology from Colorado State University. She also completed (The Art of the Cold Call). Nancy is a member of "Toastmasters International".'),
	(2, 'Fuller', 'Andrew', '1952-02-19', 'EmpID2.pic', 'Andrew received his BTS commercial and a Ph.D. in international marketing from the University of Dallas. He is fluent in French and Italian and reads German. He joined the company as a sales representative, was promoted to sales manager and was then named vice president of sales. Andrew is a member of the Sales Management Roundtable, the Seattle Chamber of Commerce, and the Pacific Rim Importers Association.'),
	(3, 'Leverling', 'Janet', '1963-08-30', 'EmpID3.pic', 'Janet has a BS degree in chemistry from Boston College). She has also completed a certificate program in food retailing management. Janet was hired as a sales associate and was promoted to sales representative.'),
	(4, 'Peacock', 'Margaret', '1958-09-19', 'EmpID4.pic', 'Margaret holds a BA in English literature from Concordia College and an MA from the American Institute of Culinary Arts. She was temporarily assigned to the London office before returning to her permanent post in Seattle.'),
	(5, 'Buchanan', 'Steven', '1955-03-04', 'EmpID5.pic', 'Steven Buchanan graduated from St. Andrews University, Scotland, with a BSC degree. Upon joining the company as a sales representative, he spent 6 months in an orientation program at the Seattle office and then returned to his permanent post in London, where he was promoted to sales manager. Mr. Buchanan has completed the courses "Successful Telemarketing" and "International Sales Management". He is fluent in French.'),
	(6, 'Suyama', 'Michael', '1963-07-02', 'EmpID6.pic', 'Michael is a graduate of Sussex University (MA, economics) and the University of California at Los Angeles (MBA, marketing). He has also taken the courses "Multi-Cultural Selling" and "Time Management for the Sales Professional". He is fluent in Japanese and can read and write French, Portuguese, and Spanish.'),
	(7, 'King', 'Robert', '1960-05-29', 'EmpID7.pic', 'Robert King served in the Peace Corps and traveled extensively before completing his degree in English at the University of Michigan and then joining the company. After completing a course entitled "Selling in Europe", he was transferred to the London office.'),
	(8, 'Callahan', 'Laura', '1958-01-09', 'EmpID8.pic', 'Laura received a BA in psychology from the University of Washington. She has also completed a course in business French. She reads and writes French.'),
	(9, 'Dodsworth', 'Anne', '1969-07-02', 'EmpID9.pic', 'Anne has a BA degree in English from St. Lawrence College. She is fluent in French and German.'),
	(10, 'West', 'Adam', '1928-09-19', 'EmpID10.pic', 'An old chum');

GROUP BY object_id
ORDER BY SchName ASC, TblName ASC;
